channel.title: website on Vandy Liu
channel.description: Recent content in website on Vandy Liu

item.title: Biocad Dental Company Website
item.description: Website picture With a friend, we worked together to recreate biocaddental.ca using Wix. I also did a little bit of coding in Google Apps Script. In particular, I automated how pictures in a form are organized in Google Drive for ease of access. I also learned a little bit about DNS, CNames and MX records.

item.title: Hugo Website (this one!)
item.description: Website This is my personal website made by using Hugo. The theme is from here. I used to use Jekyll, but wanted to make my website a little prettier. Github
